title.rendered: Teens invited to take law into their own hands

content.rendered: LAWS announces a partnership with York University's Osgoode Hall Law School, allowing the initiative to expand to include high schools in low-income neighbourhoods such as C.W. Jefferys Collegiate Institute and Westview Centennial Secondary School.
